title: Freed From Boko Haram, Hostages Now Held By Nigeria's Military
teaser: The nearly 300 people rescued last month from Boko Haram are in military custody. There are suspicions that some are working with the extremist group. Renee Montagne talks to the AP's Michelle Faul.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
